text:
Hello everyone

I'm trying to integrate a automatic dialer service with my HubSpot. Just had some queries. 

Can I integrate HubSpot through URL based integration?
Refer to the document below. Is this possible?
:wave: senior dev from WebMechanix in Maryland here

Hi everyone. Just reintroducing myself to the HubSpot CMS after about a year not really using it. There's been a lot of change! I've gone through the new quickstart lesson and I'm now diving into the documentation. Any tips on where to focus my attention first?
The local development tool and the boilerplate example belong to the biggest changes. The whole CMS was changed to the CMS Hub. You will find more inofrmation on the knowledge and designer pages.
Sup Walt? Welcome from far-away Frederick lol
The CLI is your new best friend

highly highly recommend since you’re coming back to HubSpot after some time away, check out the <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/key-concepts|key concepts page>. Even for developers who’ve built on HubSpot for a long time this should fill in some gaps and show how all the pieces of the puzzle fit.
